title: How Inflation Affects Universities
sub_head: Tuition and rising prices are concerns for students.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss inflation. Next week we’ll ask, “Social media has given college students a front row seat to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. How has seeing the violence and chaos changed your understanding of war?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before March 8. The best responses will be published that night.
